tasks.label: Create venv and install requirements
tasks.command: if (-Not (Test-Path -Path '.venv')) { python -m venv .venv; .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; pip install -r requirements.txt } else { Write-Host '.venv already exists; skipping creation and install.' }

tasks.label: Notify: Deactivate venv
tasks.command: Write-Host 'If you activated the virtual environment in this terminal, run ".\.venv\Scripts\Deactivate.ps1"'

tasks.label: Remove venv
tasks.command: if (Test-Path -Path '.venv') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .venv } else { Write-Host '.venv not present' }
